Negative.name: Plague Outbreak
Negative.desc: A deadly plague sweeps through the village, killing many inhabitants.

Negative.name: Bandit Raid
Negative.desc: Bandits raid the village, stealing resources and causing destruction.

Negative.name: Failed Harvest
Negative.desc: The harvest fails due to bad weather, leading to food shortages.

Negative.name: Lord's Tax Increase
Negative.desc: The local lord increases taxes, reducing the villagers' income.

Negative.name: Drought
Negative.desc: A severe drought affects crops and livestock.

Negative.name: Fire
Negative.desc: A fire destroys several houses and the village mill.

Negative.name: Wolf Attacks
Negative.desc: Wolves attack livestock, causing losses for farmers.

Negative.name: Flood
Negative.desc: Heavy rains cause a flood, damaging homes and fields.

Negative.name: Disease in Livestock
Negative.desc: A disease spreads among the livestock, reducing their numbers.

Negative.name: Feud with Neighboring Village
Negative.desc: A feud with a neighboring village disrupts trade and causes tension.

Negative.name: Cursed Land
Negative.desc: Rumors of cursed land scare villagers, reducing productivity.

Negative.name: Blacksmith's Accident
Negative.desc: The village blacksmith has an accident, reducing tool and weapon production.

Negative.name: Church Collapse
Negative.desc: The village church collapses, causing a loss of community morale.

Negative.name: Lost Trade Caravan
Negative.desc: A trade caravan is lost, causing a shortage of goods.

Negative.name: Noble's Hunt
Negative.desc: A noble's hunt disrupts farming and causes damage to crops.

Negative.name: Witchcraft Accusations
Negative.desc: Accusations of witchcraft cause fear and division in the village.

Negative.name: Bridge Collapse
Negative.desc: The village bridge collapses, disrupting travel and trade.

Negative.name: Invasion
Negative.desc: An invading army attacks the village, causing destruction and loss of life.

Negative.name: Cattle Theft
Negative.desc: Thieves steal cattle, reducing the village's livestock.

Negative.name: Well Poisoning
Negative.desc: The village well is poisoned, causing illness and death.

Positive.name: Good Harvest
Positive.desc: A bountiful harvest ensures plenty of food for the village.

Positive.name: New Well
Positive.desc: A new well is dug, providing fresh water for the village.

Positive.name: Market Day
Positive.desc: A successful market day brings in extra income for the villagers.

Positive.name: Birth of Heir
Positive.desc: The birth of the lord's heir ensures stability and reduces taxes.

Positive.name: New Blacksmith
Positive.desc: A skilled blacksmith sets up shop, improving tool and weapon production.

Positive.name: Pilgrimage
Positive.desc: A pilgrimage brings visitors and income to the village.

Positive.name: New Mill
Positive.desc: A new mill is built, increasing the village's grain processing capacity.

Positive.name: Favorable Weather
Positive.desc: Favorable weather leads to a successful planting season.

Positive.name: New Trade Route
Positive.desc: A new trade route opens up, bringing in more goods and income.

Positive.name: Festival
Positive.desc: A village festival boosts morale and productivity.

Positive.name: New Church
Positive.desc: A new church is built, increasing community morale and attracting pilgrims.

Positive.name: Successful Hunt
Positive.desc: A successful hunt provides extra food for the village.

Positive.name: New Lord
Positive.desc: A new lord takes over, reducing taxes and improving village life.

Positive.name: New Bridge
Positive.desc: A new bridge is built, improving travel and trade.

Positive.name: Discovery of Herbs
Positive.desc: The discovery of medicinal herbs improves the health of the villagers.

Positive.name: New Livestock
Positive.desc: New livestock are acquired, increasing the village's resources.

Positive.name: New Inn
Positive.desc: A new inn is built, attracting travelers and increasing income.

Positive.name: New School
Positive.desc: A new school is established, improving education and skills in the village.

Positive.name: New Road
Positive.desc: A new road is built, improving travel and trade.

Positive.name: New Bakery
Positive.desc: A new bakery opens, providing fresh bread and increasing morale.
